Class PersonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.PersonManager

  • public class PersonManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages a Person Each method calls the DataBaseFacade which is working with the Database

      • tryLogin

        public boolean tryLogin(java.lang.String login,
                        java.lang.String password)
        This method tries to connect a Person to the application
        Parameters:
        login - the Person's name
        password - the Person's password
        Returns:
        true if the login/password combination is good, false otherwise

      • setPersonByName

        Parameters:
        name - the Person's name
        Returns:
        true if a Person with the name exists, false otherwise
